availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Sparta, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Lucy T. Edmondson. Father of Louisa J. Edmondson, Martha B. Edmondson, Lucy Edmondson, John Edmondson, Joseph Edmondson, and Phil Edmondson. Laborer in Owen County in 1850. Farmer in Sparta in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owen County, District 1, p. 231; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owen County, District 2, Sparta, p. 9.
